projects.title: BlockBlister
projects.description: Movie app created using Firebase CRUD, Webpack, and ES6 Modules to allow users to add movies to a database. Once added, a user can click on each movie to rate it and to learn more about it. A user can also delete a movie or add it to their watchlist.
projects.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Version Control with Github
